column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Warden says : " Welcome to the Boiling Rock .
#Text=" Warden says : " Oh ?
#Text=You 'd rather look at my shoes ?
#Text=Then take a look !
#Text=" Warden says : " I know exactly who you are , Hakoda of the Water Tribe .
#Text=So strong - willed .
#Text=But do n't worry , we 'll get rid of that in time .
#Text=Now look me in the eye !
#Text=" Warden says : " See , is n't that better ?
#Text=You will all do as I say or pay the price .
#Text=You will all - " Bogyguard # 2 says : " Are you okay , sir ?
#Text=" Warden says : " I 'm fine !
#Text=Get these prisoners out of my sight !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Thank goodness you 're okay .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " If you take one step closer , you 'll see just how " okay " I am .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Dad , it 's me .
#Text=" Hakoda says : " Sokka , my son .
#Text=You know Sokka , you should be more careful with that guard outfit on .
#Text=I almost punched you in the gut .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , I ran into that problem earlier .
#Text="
